name: OVERTALE
description:
IMPORTANT: If you want to play it in full screen 

Press F1 while in the launcher

Choose from the options

Restart the game

It is relatively short but has at least three endings and a lot of replay value. Your choices will affect everything in the game so feel free to play it your way!

There really isn't much else to say that the trailer doesn't already show off so...

I really hope you enjoy my game and please tell me what you think! Yes I know there are some grammar issues but I made it when I was 15 so sue me.
